subject: Off Topic : Urgent Req. Project Manager for an American MNC
msgSnippet: Dear All, This is an urgent requirement.  We are looking for a Project Manager with over 10 years of experience in Java/J2EE technologies... for an American
messageBody:
Dear All,

This is an urgent requirement. We are looking for a Project Manager
with over 10 years of experience in Java/J2EE technologies... for an
American MNC in Bangalore. Details below.

Only those who meet all the requirements are requested to send in
their resumes to John@...

Thanks.
John Amirtharaj
John @ alphaeus.com
+91-80-5121 6414 to 17

===============================================
Company: Bangalore based American MNC
Role: Project Manager
Code : PMY2701

Requirements:

· Should be a skilled, hands-on technology expert.
· At least 10 years of experience in Object-oriented
technologies, and significant expertise in distributed computing
technologies.
· Ability to lead (technologically) multiple programs
simultaneously, and to help converge these into a product. Experience
in products preferred.
· Preferred educational background in B.Tech / BE (Computer
Science).
· Technologies: Unix, Windows, Java, EJB, XML, JSP, C++, OO
Case tools such as Rational Rose, CORBA/COM
· 'Perl and Java experience required
· 'Relational database experience required
· 'Must be able to self-manage; elicit requirements; work with
customers;
· 'Ability to create and manage project plans for small teams
(up to 3-5 people)
· Strong communications skills (oral and written), strong
initiative, extremely strong product perspective, problem-solving
capabilities and very strong teaming skills
